attributes.action: Companies should be obliged to display where their products are made.
attributes.background: There is no obligation for companies to display where their products are made. Whilst there is some information displayed on labels this is often inconsistent and is never displayed on their website. Retailers should take ownership of their supply chain know where their products are sourced.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to make companies display where their products are made. You could start a petition calling on the Government to introduce legislation to make this a requirement.
